articles.description: Zimbabwe journalist Hopewell Chin'ono has been arrested by police in the country for the third time in six months, his lawyer told CNN on Friday.

articles.author: Konstantin Toropin and Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: 14 passengers banned by airline after rowdy DC to Seattle flight
articles.description: Alaska Airlines banned more than a dozen passengers this week for not complying to its mask mandate and for harassing staff members.

articles.title: 'I was so proud': Biden praises Mitch McConnell
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden praised Sen. Mitch McConnell (R-KY) and Sen. Mitt Romney (R-UT) for standing up to President Trump and agreeing to certify Biden's win.

articles.title: Read: House Democrats' draft of a new article of impeachment against Trump
articles.description: House Democrats have circulated a draft of a new impeachment resolution against President Donald Trump with one article of impeachment, "incitement of insurrection."

articles.author: Eric Bradner, CNN
articles.title: Biden says Trump skipping inauguration is 'a good thing'
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden said President Donald Trump's decision to skip his inauguration is "one of the few things he and I have ever agreed on."

articles.author: Peter Valdes-Dapena, CNN Business
articles.title: GM redesigns its logo after more than 50 years
articles.description: General Motors unveiled a new logo Friday that the company says symbolizes its shift toward electric vehicles.
